nodes.text: Clan Rodarch was a Mandalorian clan in existence during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Members of the Rodarch clan were known for keeping asharl panthers, training them to fight in battle alongside them. The clan's warriors took pride in the fearless, ever-aware reputation of the asharl panthers, and over time, Clan Rodarch adopted the asharl panther as its mascot, painting their armor in a manner designed to emulate the creature's pelts.
Clan Rodarch was first introduced to Star Wars canon in the massively multiplayer online game, Star Wars: The Old Republic, created by BioWare and released December 20, 2011.
